articles.author: Pragati Pal
articles.title: India Bags Prestigious Award for Efforts to Combat Measles, Rubella - News18
articles.description: The award was given by the Measles and Rubella Partnership at the American Red Cross Headquarters in Washington DC, US on March 6
articles.content: India has been bestowed with the prestigious Measles and Rubella Champion Award in recognition of the countrys tireless efforts to combat these infectious diseases, the health ministry said on Friday… [+2207 chars]

articles.title: Dr. Jennifer Ashton discusses societal stigma surrounding menopause - Good Morning America
articles.description: ABC News chief medical correspondent Dr. Jennifer Ashton gives her analysis of a recent study on women's health and menopause.SUBSCRIBE: https://bit.ly/2Zq0d...
